title: SLA - Westerstraat
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Organic, Raw, Western, Salad bar, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Cafeteria and salad bar with many vegan choices, including Vegetarian Butcher products. The VB chicken is vegan. Coffee can be requested with soy or almond milk without additional charge.
